metadata.name: Klay Giant Lone
metadata.description:
This original is hand-drawn by Doug TenNapel in Photoshop. Inspired by the color work of animation backgrounds, the goal is to limit blending and rendering, while emphasizing depth and form. Doug TenNapel is the creator of video games like Earthworm Jim and the Neverhood, he made the animated series Catscratch for Nickelodeon and has written and drawn over twenty graphic novels. 
3000 x 2400 pixels, Photoshop, 2022.
